name: Repel
desc: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Strafe
desc: Clinkz nimbly attacks with a barrage of arrows. Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time and grants Clinkz the ability to automatically dodge projectiles.

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

name: Corrosive Haze
desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

name: Static Link
desc: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

name: Firestorm
desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

name: Spell Shield
desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Searing Chains
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

name: Juxtapose
desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

name: Ghostship
desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.\n\nUpgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
